Text:
This week's Audiosurf featured artist, with 5 tracks from this album free for play :)

Good stuff.
OGG?  Seriously?  Why not just distribute it as ATRAC if you're going to choose a difficult format, that way -nobody- can play it.
Could you put up a lossless version as FLAC?
What the fuck is OGG?  Seriously, what the hell am I supposed to do with this?  My WinRAR won't even touch this download.  Anyone?

Ogg is an audio container format that usually holds audio compressed in the Vorbis format. Vorbis is lossy so it's like mp3 but it generally has a higher compression ratio while being higher quality than mp3. Worth while media players can play it, which means itunes can't ;) (at least not without some extra work)
